title: Emiliano Bonassi’s Dev Bounty Sizing
body:
### Summary

In the last few month,  Emiliano Bonassi’s contribution has brought value to Idle protocol with integrations and security reviews; Idle Governance should now officialize the size of the bounty through this snapshot poll.

This [forum post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/bounty-to-emiliano-a-chance-to-setup-a-developer-mining-program/251)  illustrates how Emiliano contributed to expanding the Idle’s ecosystem and this initiative aims to reward his commitment, talent, and efforts.

### Details
These are the main initiatives led by Emiliano:
* [Yearn V2 USDC Idle strategy](https://twitter.com/idlefinance/status/1357446289747828737);
* [Yearn V2 WBTC Idle strategy](https://twitter.com/idlefinance/status/1357030609588281352);
* [Yearn V2 sUSD Idle strategy](https://twitter.com/idlefinance/status/1356647948743016452);
* [Yearn V2 USDT Idle strategy](https://twitter.com/emilianobonassi/status/1366175156612304898)
* [Yearn V2 TUSD Idle strategy](https://twitter.com/emilianobonassi/status/1366180371394662401)
* [Curve and Harvest accounting bug report](https://twitter.com/emilianobonassi/status/1342882847716237318);
* [IdleTokenHelper](https://twitter.com/emilianobonassi/status/1344419709597458432), a tool to simplify Idle protocol integration for third-party services.
 
The deployment cost for the above implementations has been ~$15k-20k (costs are reported in the forum post) - bearing this cost in mind, we can then look at his commitment in terms of knowledge, time, increased visibility for Idle and TVL.
 
Regarding the TVL, you can see currently deployed capital from yEarn and deposit events in [this referral dashboard](https://explore.duneanalytics.com/dashboard/idle-best-yield-strat-referrals-deposit-redeem?p_w15331_Address=0xd0579bc5c0f839ea2bcc79bb127e2f39801903e2).
 
### Voting Options

Please cast your vote on one of the following options, choosing the amount that in your opinion matches Emiliano’s contributions:

* Vote “**1500 $IDLE**”
* Vote “**2000 $IDLE**”
* Vote “**2500 $IDLE**”
* Vote “**3000 $IDLE**”
* Vote “**3500 $IDLE**”
* Vote “**Discuss more**”, if you do not agree with the listed options.

Snapshot is an off-chain solution to cast a vote by signature, with no gas fees.
author: 0x9993ADB62085AcB05Fc493f7A1D10C11227A78fa
